review_all_proposal: Participants may be eligible for reward
author: Proposer
koge_desc: Proposer must contribute to reward pool, as a compensation 4.8% of this pool will return to proposer when proposal ends properly. Noted it is encouraged to post in advance at https://t.me/gov_48club and make it fully discussed before officially proposing in DAO.
title: Title
vote-refund-hint: The proposal is invalid because it did not reach the required number of votes.
voted_hint: You have participated in the vote: Please wait for the final voting results!
interim_result_for: The current total number of Approve votes is greater than {{forVotesLevel}} of the total number of votes, and the proposal progresses to Approve
interim_result_against: The current total number of Approve votes is not greater than {{forVotesLevel}} of the total number of votes, and the proposal progresses to reject.
away_from_valid_vote_threshold: need KOGE votes to reach quorum
